Key Match Events: Ángel Di María scored the winning goal in the 40th minute with a through ball from Cristian Romero
Post-Match Reflections: Ángel Di María said it was a deserved win and they have to keep working as they always do and stay as united
Lionel Messi watched Di Maria's goal from the bench before replacing him in the 56th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina edge past Ecuador 1-0 in Copa America warmup
The Copa América will be held in the United States from June 20-July 14
Others: Ángel Di María will retire from international duty after the Copa América
Argentina take on Guatemala in another friendly on Friday before the defending champions kick off their Copa America campaign against Canada on June 20
